text: Ara yakhana tadera kache allahâ€Œra tarapha theke ekakhana dharmagrantha ela yate samarthana rayeche ya tadera kache ache -- yadi'o itipurbe tara prarthana karato yara abisbasa posana kare tadera upare bijayi habara jan'ye, -- kintu yakhana tadera kache elena yamke tara cinate parala tara tamke abisbasa kare basalo. Sutaram allahâ€Œra naraji abisbasidera upare.
